instructions: In Notes on iCloud.com, select the note you want to delete. If you don t see the notes list, see Show the notes or folder list in Notes on iCloud.com . Tap the Delete button in the toolbar. When you delete a note, it s moved to the Recently Deleted folder. You can view and recover notes in the Recently Deleted folder for up to 30 days before they re permanently removed. If you want to edit notes in the Recently Deleted folder, you must first recover them .

In Notes on iCloud.com, select Recently Deleted in the folder list. If you don t see the folder list, see Show the notes or folder list in Notes on iCloud.com . If you don t see Recently Deleted, you don t have any notes in that folder, and there s nothing to be recovered. Select a note, then tap Recover in the toolbar. The note moves to the Notes folder.

In Notes on iCloud.com, select Recently Deleted in the folder list. If you don t see the folder list, see Show the notes or folder list in Notes on iCloud.com . If you don t see Recently Deleted, you don t have any recently deleted notes. Select a note you want to permanently remove. Tap the Delete button in the toolbar. The selected note is removed immediately.
